Watch Sway Clarke II’s Acoustic Performance of “I Don’t Need Much”

posted by Confusion on October 24, 2014 in Video

Sway Clarke II just released his new song “Tangerine,” and for this clip he revisits the first song we ever heard from him (and a personal favorite), “I Don’t Need Much.” Instead of the big drums and smooth production, Sway goes acoustic for this one. We’ve always known that Sway was a great singer and a talented songwriter, but this clip shows he can perform too. If you’ve seen him live, you already know that.

Tags:  sway clarke, Sway Clarke II
